CST2355_Final_19W Merriam Webster Dictionary News Feed Flight Status tracker New York Times Article Search buttomgotocheckflight WELCOME TO NEWS FEED Help Type here to search GO BACK Search Author: Linlin Cheng
 Version Number: 1.0
 Instruction:
 1. This app has 4 main functions which are search, add to favorites, delete from favorites, and link to the original web.

2. If clients want to read the whole article just clicking the item listed on the screen after searching and save it by simply clicking the save button if you want. 

3. Clicking the icons listed on the top, clients can go to different sections this app linked such as the icon with heart is for favorites and the plane icon is for checking airplane status. DELETE FAVORITES SAVE TO FAVORITES Author:leon Version:1.0 instruction
1.The saved articles will be displayed in list view.
2.Click search button to start an article search in New York Times.
3.Click an item in list view will open a browser to view the article.
4.Click the switch in the end of each item in article list will save or delete the article. Enter a keyword to start search Saved articles Saved Not saved Welcome to New York Times! Article saved successfully! Article save failed! Article deleted! application Author: Deyuan Liu application version number 10 application flight Instruction:input airportcode, then click BUTTONGOTOCHECKFLIGHT. You will see the airplane code and departing code click the airplane code. You will see the detail of the airplane flight help There is no internet connection! Go Back Name Recent search Saved BACK Enter text to search Help Search This dictionary is developed by Belle. Version No.1. To use this dictionary, go to the main page and click the dictionary icon on the top toolbar. Once there, just click the search button on the top dictionary toolbar to get inside.
